name: MASON ABOVE
description:
Made for #LOWREZJAM2020.

Match-3 Puzzle Game where you need to match coloured bricks. The ceiling goes down on you, so you need to keep clearing blocks to keep the whole ceiling up.

The game has two difficulties (Easy and Hard) and two play modes (fixed levels and endless).

In the Fixed Levels, you need to do a certain amount of moves as possible, the more blocks cleared by the time the moves are up, the higher the score.
